personalInfo.name: Linden Hutchinson
personalInfo.title: Software Engineer
personalInfo.description: Innovative Software Engineer with extensive experience in full-stack development, security enhancements, and project leadership. Adept at breaking down complex requirements into actionable tasks, optimising workflows, and delivering scalable solutions that drive efficiency and improve security.

experience.description: Contributed to the enhancement of a legacy Laravel/Kohana platform by uplifting and optimising code, improving security, and developing new features for the React web and mobile applications.
achievements: Dramatically improved database performance by optimising a key SQL query, resulting in a 96% reduction in execution time.
Conducted a thorough security audit of the existing codebase, identifying vulnerabilities and implementing immediate remediations to enhance system security.
Architected and implemented improved security patterns and best practices to safeguard the application and user data.
Developed and maintained features for the GraphQL API and React-based web and mobile applications, focusing on improving user experience and functionality.

experience.description: As a full-stack developer, worked on the software team responsible for developing a range of security-focused products for Australian Government clients, as well as an internal SaaS product. Promoted to Senior Software Developer while at Tesserent.
achievements: Translated customer requirements into software design specifications, including detailed scopes of work and project estimates.
Developed continuous integration pipelines including automatic systems builds and unit test runs, with outputs reported to standard channels.
Architected and implemented an internal greenfield React application involving a complex integration with multiple APIs.
Performed code reviews for features developed by other members of the development team.
Developed unit and end-to-end tests for all features written.

experience.description: Worked on a legacy PHP system, investigating and resolving key issues. Collaborated with stakeholders to improve client satisfaction and worked on a variety of projects, including a bespoke Laravel application for event management.
achievements: Modernised a legacy PHP system by investigating and resolving key issues, leading to improved stability and client satisfaction.
Developed a bespoke Laravel application for event management, streamlining processes and improving efficiency.
Engineered a Vue.js data dashboard with a PHP REST API, implementing a full test suite using PHPUnit and Playwright to ensure reliability.
Implemented and optimised complex SQL queries involving millions of rows to improve application performance.

experience.description: Supported the enhancement of the Learning Management System by developing dynamic UI components using Angular and Ruby on Rails.
achievements: Expanded LMS functionality with interactive UI components, significantly improving student engagement and streamlining the digital learning experience.

projects.title: Real-Time Multiplayer Game
projects.description: Architected and implemented a real-time multiplayer social deduction game featuring a decoupled frontend and a robust backend. The backend is built with Django and Django Ninja for a typed REST API, with real-time communication handled by Django Channels and Redis. The frontend uses Alpine.js for lightweight, reactive state management, and the entire application is containerised with Docker for seamless development and deployment.
